entry.title: Jorstad - Twin Sleigh Bed
entry.summary:
Vendor: Ashley Furniture
Type: Twin Bed Frame
Price: 499.99

With a clean light gray finish flowing over the classic Louis Phillippe styling, the “Jorstad” bedroom collection flawlessly captures the essence of relaxed traditional design. The ogee shaped top moulding and bracket feet along with the upholstered panel sleigh headboard with a textural gray-white fabric adorned with nail head detailing creates a beautiful bedroom collection you’ll be proud to own.

Made with Birch veneers and select hardwood solids and finished in a light gray paint for clean and crisp appearance. Classic Louis Phillippe styling with ogee shaped top moulding and bracket feet. Sleigh bed has an upholstered panel with a textural gray-white fabric with nail head detailing.

entry.title: Kaslyn - Twin Panel Bed
entry.summary:
Vendor: Ashley Furniture
Type: Twin Bed Frame
Price: 749.99

The beauty of cottage design shines with the bright white durable finish along with the stylish “X” motif and half rounded pilasters adorning the bed and case pieces making the “Kaslyn” bedroom collection the perfect way to create a cottage getaway within your own home.

Made with MDF and poplar solids.

Half round pilasters set on stylish turned bun feet. Cottage styling is earmarked by the use of overlay "X" motifs. Stylish single drawer night stand with open "X" back design. Bright white finish features a durable UV base coat for long lasting beauty.

entry.title: Nashburg - Twin Metal Bed
entry.summary:
Vendor: Ashley Furniture
Type: Twin Bed Frame
Price: 379.99

Country cottage. Farmhouse chic. Vintage industrial. However you see it, you’re sure to be instantly charmed by this retro-inspired twin metal bed. Finished in an aged pewter-tone, its steel frame with moulded "fittings" brilliantly mimics wrought-iron beds from yesteryear. Let yourself drift away to a simpler time and place. Mattress and foundation/box spring available, sold separately.

Product Features
  • Made of steel
  • Includes headboard, footboard and rails
  • Aged pewter-tone finish
  • Assembly required
  • Mattress and foundation/box spring available, sold separately

About Nashburg
Whether it’s the welded tubular metal in a bronze color powder coat finish, the welded tubular and sheet metal in a brushed pewter color finish or the welded tubular and sheet metal in a bronze color finish adorned with cushions covered in twill weave oatmeal color fabric, the “Metal Beds” collection features moulded metal accents and a rich vintage design perfect to enhance the beauty of any home.
